results.title: Repositioning of simvastatin for diabetic colon cancer: role of CDK4 inhibition and apoptosis.
results.text_hl: There is increased risk of @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colon cancer@@@ in both @SPECIES_9606 @@@men@@@ and @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ having @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@. The objective of the study was to evaluate the role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@colon cancer@@@ associated with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@.

results.title: The neuroprotective effect of simvastatin on the cerebellum of experimentally-induced diabetic rats through klotho upregulation: An immunohistochemical study.
results.text_hl: MATERIALS & METHODS: 24 adult albino @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were divided into 4 groups; control, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ (induced by single intraperitoneal injection of @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@ 45 mg/kg) and @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ treated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (10 mg/kg once daily) after confirmation of @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.
